text: Renate Maria Dorrestein (25 January 1954 â€“ 4 May 2018) was a Dutch writer, journalist and feminist. She won the Annie Romein prize in 1993. She started working as a journalist for a magazine called Panorama. She published her first novel (Buitenstaanders) in 1983. She was born in Amsterdam. Dorrestein died on 4 May 2018 of esophageal cancer in Amsterdam at the age of 64.Schrijfster Renate Dorrestein (64) overleden ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1954 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from esophageal cancer Category:Dutch journalists Category:Dutch novelists Category:Feminist writers Category:Writers from Amsterdam
